name: read-access-specification
description: Represents a BACnet ReadAccessSpecification, specifying an object and a list of properties to read.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object to read from.

fields.name: list-of-property-references
fields.description: A list of property references to be read from the object.
